Module com.boslott
Package com.boslott.DataAccess

Class UCertdbUserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.boslott.DataAccess.UCertdbUserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAO
public class UCertdbUserDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserDAO
A UCertdbUserDAO object is a UserDAO object used to interact with User data from the UCertify database data source
Author:
Steven Slott

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    UCertdbUserDAO()
    Constructs a UCertdbUserDAO object and gets a connection to the UCertify database

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<User> findAllUsers()
    Gets all User data from the UCertify database

    Calls the private class method to get a single User entry from the UCertify database with the userName property value of name

  • Constructor Details

    • UCertdbUserDAO

      public UCertdbUserDAO() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Constructs a UCertdbUserDAO object and gets a connection to the UCertify database
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there is a database access error

  • Method Details

    • findUser

      public User findUser​(java.lang.String name)
      Calls the private class method to get a single User entry from the UCertify database with the userName property value of name
      Specified by:
      findUser in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      name - the userName property value of the User entry to search for
      Returns:
      the User object containing the property values of the User entry with the userName name

    • isCorrectPassword

      public java.lang.Boolean isCorrectPassword​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String pass)
      A method that searches the UCertify database for a User with the userName property value of name. If found, the User entry password is checked against the String pass. If the User entry password equals the String pass, true is returned
      Specified by:
      isCorrectPassword in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      name - the inputted userName to search the UCertify database for
      pass - the inputted password to compare to the database entry password
      Returns:
      true if the passwords are equal, false if the passwords are not equal

    • findAllUsers

      public java.util.ArrayList<User> findAllUsers()
      Gets all User data from the UCertify database
      Specified by:
      findAllUsers in interface UserDAO
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all User objects from the UCertify database
